content:
# The 10 iron ore has been successfully inserted into the stone furnace, which is now actively working and has 9 iron ore remaining to smelt.
# 
# The furnace has already produced 14 iron plates, and it will continue to produce more as it processes the remaining iron ore.
# 
# While the furnace is working, I can plan my next steps. Once I have enough iron plates, I will craft the Assembling Machine and then proceed to create Iron Gear Wheels and other necessary components.
# 
# I will wait for a moment to allow the furnace to smelt the remaining iron ore into plates.

sleep(10)  # Wait for 10 seconds to allow the furnace to continue smelting.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the status of entities after waiting.
